message.body: Hey ##### Brett here. What's your schedule looking like during your stay? Sara and I have a newborn and we are trying to figure plans out.

I'm here till the 16th and am just playing it by ear and seeing old friends when its easy for them. I don't have a fixed schedule but will try to update you as I do things. Only thing I'm planning on doing is a drink tomorrow night at footsies and an art opening at Regent projects on sat eve.
Congratulations to you and sarAh on the little guy!
So we will be at el prado on sunset tonight at 7 if u need a break from the little one
Sara wanted I hang out too. How about if Sara and i drive up on Monday or Tuesday, pick you up or meet you and have lunch in Glendale. Anytime Monday or Tuesday would work for us
Ok that may work. Let me run it by the people I'm with and see if we can throw it in the schedule.
